description: Information about the cell line used in the sample
title: cell_line

cell_type.description: The cell type that the cell line was derived from. Should be a CLO ontology.

date_established.description: When the cell line was established, in date-time formatyyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.

disease.description: Free text describing any disease association to the cell type. Should be found in EFO ontology.

passage_number.description: The number of passages the cell line has been through.

cell_cycle.description: The cell cycle phase if the cell line is synchronized growing cells or the phase is known.

primary_cell_line.description: Information about conditions of death (or info that donor was living at time of collection).

immortalized_cell_line.description: Information about conditions of death (or info that donor was living at time of collection).
